title: Chapelwaite's Showrunners on Mixing New England Lore With Stephen King
itunes:title: Chapelwaite's Showrunners on Mixing New England Lore With Stephen King
itunes:subtitle: Writers and executive producers Jason Filardi, Peter Filardi, and Donald De Line join the Losers to chat about EPIX's new Stephen King series, Chapelwaite. The three masterminds behind the series discuss New England lore, the aesthetic inspiration...
description:
Writers and executive producers Jason Filardi, Peter Filardi, and Donald De Line join the Losers to chat about EPIX's new Stephen King series, Chapelwaite. The three masterminds behind the series discuss New England lore, the aesthetic inspiration behind the vampires, and connections to 2004's TNT 'Salem's Lot miniseries. Want to see the video interview? Become a member of our Patreon via patreon.com/thebarrens


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
